content: point to the next seven stitches on the 7th point fasten_off 12th point- remove all point markers and stuff bottom half of the dodecahedron firmly adding cat toys to the middle to make noise optional with right sides facing begin slip stitching the stitches on row 13 of the 12th point to the remaining unworked stitches on the dodecahedron until 14 unworked stitches remain finish stuffing the dodecahedron firmly use a yarn needle to sew the remaining unworked stitches on the 12th point to the remaining unworked stitches on the dodecahedron fasten_off finish by stitching up any corners that stretched enough during stuffing for the stuffing to show through before stitching after stitching
